text: Christian Puibaraud (born 21 February 1938) is a French rower. He competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics in Rome with the men's eight where they came fourth. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:French male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of France Category:Rowers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:People from Courbevoie Category:World Rowing Championships medalists for France Category:Sportspeople from Hauts-de-Seine Category:European Rowing Championships medalists
title: Christian Puibaraud
